caption.p: The free fatty acid (FFA) release rates (%) and initial rates (mM/s) in a pH-stat digestion model ( a); and lipolysis rates (%) after 30 min of digestion in the simulated model of small intestinal digestion ( b). Statistical differences are indicated by letters where significant differences were detected ( p < 0.05). Abbreviation: SBO, soybean oil; PGO, pomegranate seed oil; PHY, physical blend; IO, interesterified oil.
